name: Bolted
description:
Bolted is a local multiplayer 1v1 arena fighting game, where you fight as crossbow headed Robots  for the favour of the Robot King. Use powerups to outksill your opponent, in a best of 5 scenario!

The game  was created in Unreal engine 4.

Features: 

  • 2 Player controller support.
  • Keyboard and controller support
  • 5 Awesome maps 
  • 3 power ups to spice up your game play 
  • Custom sound track and sound FX

Bolted is our second year university project, created by a team of 4 students from UCW(and an external music producer), over the span of 3 months.

Twitter: @BoltedGame

Game by:

2D Artist, Sound and Level Design: Dan Baldwin

3D Artist: Will Powell

Visual Scripting: Owen Rees

Animation,UI Design and Branding: Sam Stokes

Music: Oli Hulett Twitter Facebook

This game requires at least one Xbox 360/One controller to play.
